document_data.name: ''Edventar's Gift''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Edventar's Gift''''' was a unique ''[[ring of free action]]''.
document_data.Powers: The wearer of the ring was immune to effects, objects or other impediments that limited or hampered their movement. Similarly, their movements could not be enhanced by in any way, such as by [[haste|certain spells]].
document_data.History:
This ring was named after [[Edventar]], a scavenger that played no small part in the defeat of the "Pirate Queen" [[Yenandra Hazm'cri]]. He was gifted his namesake ring by a group of [[aquatic elves]] he counted among his friends.

One suchring, original or a replica, was worn by [[Purvis]], the assassin who was hired by the speaker of [[Lonelywood]] in the {{YearlinkName|1281}}.
